document_data.name: Golden Szorp
document_data.mainbody: '''Golden szorp''' was a species of tiny [[fish]] that inhabited the [[Lake Glorfindar]] in the [[Starmetal Hills]] and remained active through the winter months under the lake's ice.
document_data.Description: Golden szorp were tiny creatures not used in cooking. They were a rare baitfish beloved by other bigger species of fish consumed in the north.
document_data.Ecology: Golden szorp fishes were sought after during the annual [[Simril]] celebration in [[Twilight Tor]]. They were used to fish for bigger edible species such as [[brown bream]], [[blackjaw]], [[candlefish]], and [[durgrace]].
